title: CWiauPropertyList::SetCurrentValue(INT,BYTE,INT) (wiautil.h)
description: The CWiauPropertyList::SetCurrentValue(INT,BYTE,INT) method sets the current value of a property consisting of an array of bytes, and sets its type to VT_UI1 or VT_VECTOR.
